content: the aspen throw blanket is a gorgeous modern crochet blanket pattern that you will love to cozy up in this is a timeless and easy crochet blanket pattern that is great for medium to advanced beginners or experienced crocheters looking for a relaxing pattern it embraces comfort with it s simple ribbing and cozy construction working corner to corner this modern crochet throw blanket pattern has beautiful diagonal ribbing that brings visual and touch interest as well as keeping the pattern interesting to work this crochet blanket pattern uses bulky 5 weight yarn which works up quickly and beautifully as a bonus the bulky yarn lends a little extra weight to this project which gives it a nice weighted blanket feel *this pattern has been updated on april 5 2024* ★skill level confident advanced beginner - this half_double_crochet blanket pattern heavily relies on the usage of half double crochets of course this means that you should be familiar and comfortable with half double crochets crocheters looking to follow this pattern should also *know how to read a crochet pattern there is no video tutorial for this pattern though there is a step by step photo tutorial in the pdf pattern *know how to work in the back loop only or be willing to learn *understand how to put multiple stitches into one stitch increasing *know how to work half_double_crochet decreases such as the hdc2tog and hdc3tog or be willing to learn **all special stitches are explained in depth with photos inside the full version with photos pattern ★pattern includes 1 full version pdf which includes step by step photo tutorials for parts 1 2 and 3 and all special techniques/stitches the photo tutorials also have the steps written in detail not short hand to help beginners through 2 printer friendly pdf to save ink no tutorial pictures 3 a row repeat table to help you keep track of which row you re on included in both versions ★terms used us standard pattern is written in english ★size approximately 50 inches x 42 inches this is an adult size crochet blanket pattern it is very easy to customize the size and how to do so is explained in the pattern ★materials required for this crochet throw blanket pattern you will need a bulky 5 weight yarn of your choice you will need approximately 52 oz/ 1475g/ 1400 yards yarn used red heart hygge in pearl ★tools 6 mm j-10 hook tapestry needle scissors stitch markers make sure to tag me in your instagram photos so i can show you some love tag @theloopholefoxcrochet or use #theloopholefoxcrochet to show me your finished work i hope you love your easy crochet throw blanket as much as i love mine enjoy happy crocheting the loophole fox
